min. one change in a deduction part (header or details)

CADB_Finance-/Creditlimit will be always calculated if something is changed on a
line (only where CADB_BALANACETOTAL <> 0); see SCR for more details

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/debc, :1/debb, :1/invo where DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION = 'Y' and DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and (INVO_AACTUALI < 0 or days(':4') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) > :5) for fetch only

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast(sum(CADB_BALANCETOTAL) as decimal (8)), cast(sum(CADB_BALANCEOVERDUE407DAYS) as decimal(8)), cast(sum(CADB_BALANCELIMITEXCEEDED) as decimal (8)), cast(sum(CADB_BALANCEOTHERDEDUCTION) as decimal(8)) from :1/CADB where CADB_CLAC_NO = :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: ... init CADB_BALANCELIMITEXCEEDED

The values of the currently selected row will be added in T.S.
